channel.title: Fire Cape + 4 Stat Rings In Shop = Client Crash?
channel.description:
Recently added Fire Cape + 4 Stat Rings Into a shop
Now everytime you open this shop, Client Crashes.
Why ?
It appears to be the Fire Cape,
Why does the Fire Cape cause crashes ?

item.title: Fire Cape + 4 Stat Rings In Shop = Client Crash?
item.dc:creator: @hidendra Hidendra
item.description:
@hidendra wrote:

Umm is Fire cape [ID: 6570] in your item.cfg…? Because if it’s not, anyitem you attempt to wear or something like that will crash.
If you do not, add it. Then it should work.

If it is in item.cfg I duno. =/

Read full topic
item.source: Fire Cape + 4 Stat Rings In Shop = Client Crash?
